channel.title: Angry Tanks
channel.description:
For my programming course I have to create a simple tank game
We have to work with a model-view-controller-model
There's already much done on the model part, not on the view though
Solution explorer [img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/sl38s7.jpg[/img]
Background rendering [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2z7j4w5.jpg[/img]
